com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview.animation

Class SVTransitionAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview.animation.SVAnimation
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview.animation.SVTransitionAnimation

  • public class SVTransitionAnimation
extends SVAnimation
    This Class is responsible to make all the transition animation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SVTransitionAnimation

        public SVTransitionAnimation(int transitionType,
                     int directionType)
        Creates an instance of SVTransitionAnimation with the specified transition and direction types.
        Parameters:
        transitionType - The type of transition used, see the constants for more information.
        directionType - The direction the transition goes in, see the constants for more information.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if invalid transition type or direction type
        See Also:
        SVTransitionAnimation

    • Method Detail

      • setDirectionType

        public void setDirectionType(int directionType)
        Set the direction the transition animation goes in.
        Parameters:
        directionType - The direction the transition goes in, see the constants for more information.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the direction type is invalid, see the constants for more information.

      • setTransitionType

        public void setTransitionType(int transitionType)
        Set the type of transition the animation uses.
        Parameters:
        transitionType - The transition animation type, see the constants for more information.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the transition type is invalid, see the constants for more information.
